name: Post_Fetch_Workflow
description: Workflow to fetch and process post data from external API.

transitions.name: fetch_post_data
transitions.description: Fetch data from the JSONPlaceholder API.

transitions.name: process_post_data
transitions.description: Process the fetched post data and prepare for storage.

externalized_processors.name: process_fetch_post
externalized_processors.description: Fetch post data from the external API.

transitions.name: persist_post_data
transitions.description: Persist the processed post data to the internal storage.

externalized_processors.name: process_persist_post
externalized_processors.description: Persist the post entity to the database.
